msg: Dear students, Berkeley University Of California health professionals have been closely monitoring the spread of COVID-19 over the past two months. Therefore the university is organizing an online part time job to sustain the students living. I'm pleased to inform you that our reputable company CORESTAFF SERVICES Inc, is currently running a student empowerment program.  Kindly email back with your personal emailaddress if interested in this job position. Kind regards from Donna Lisa, HR Manager CORESTAFF SERVICES.
